meanings.definition: The process of introducing an acetyl group into a compound.
meanings.sent1: During the acetylation, the acetyl group was added to the compound.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the acetylation of the compound in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The acetylation of the compound turned it into a new substance.
meanings.sent4: Her experiment was like an acetylation, transforming the compound completely.
meanings.sent5: The acetylation process changed the compound forever.

meanings.definition: The introduction of an acetyl group into a compound.
meanings.sent1: The compound underwent acetylation to add the acetyl group.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use acetylation to modify the compound's properties.
meanings.sent3: The acetylation of the compound made it smell like vinegar.
meanings.sent4: The acetylation was a key step in the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: After acetylation, the compound had a new structure.
